column1: Smoque BBQ////We tried the baby back ribs
column4: and baked beans. He had their Mac and Cheese
column6: so none of that for me). Everything was awesome. The ribs had those pink smoke rings in them and the meat was super tender (I don't generally eat pork
column9: and I liked that the coleslaw was vinegar-based rather than slathered with mayo. I wish the barbecue sauce was slightly spicier
column10: but I just like things that burn my mouth!
